import React,{useState}from'react';import{AssetEditorLayout}from'./framework';/**
 * Simple test component to demonstrate the asset editor framework
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AssetEditorTest=()=>{const[content,setContent]=useState('# Example Feature File

Feature: Test Feature
  In order to test the asset editor framework
  As a developer
  I want to edit and save content

  Scenario: Edit content
    Given I have content to edit
    When I make changes
    Then I can save locally or to GitHub');const[originalContent]=useState('# Example Feature File

Feature: Test Feature
  In order to test the asset editor framework
  As a developer
  I want to edit and save content

  Scenario: Edit content
    Given I have content to edit
    When I make changes
    Then I can save locally or to GitHub');// Mock file object
const file={name:'test-feature.feature',path:'input/features/test-feature.feature'};// Mock repository object
const repository={name:'test-dak',owner:{login:'demo-user'},full_name:'demo-user/test-dak'};const handleSave=(savedContent,saveType)=>{console.log(`Saved to ${saveType}:`,savedContent);alert(`Content saved to ${saveType}!`);};const hasChanges=content!==originalContent;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AssetEditorLayout,{pageName:"asset-editor-test",file:file,repository:repository,branch:"main",content:content,originalContent:originalContent,hasChanges:hasChanges,isDemo:true,onSave:handleSave,saveButtonsPosition:"top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'1rem',padding:'1rem',background:'#f8f9fa',borderRadius:'8px',minHeight:'400px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Asset Editor Framework Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This demonstrates the new asset editor framework with independent save buttons."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"content-editor",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Edit Content:"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"content-editor",value:content,onChange:e=>setContent(e.target.value),style:{flex:1,minHeight:'300px',padding:'1rem',fontFamily:'monospace',fontSize:'14px',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'4px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'1rem',fontSize:'0.9rem',color:'#666'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["File: ",file.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Repository: ",repository.full_name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Branch: main"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Demo Mode: true"}),hasChanges&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:'#007bff'},children:"• Unsaved changes"})]})]})});};export default AssetEditorTest;
